The author of the piece uses HER as an example of what's wrong with America? NO..that's incorrect....She IS a factor, yes, but so is the guy who wrote the story, this Charles Topher...On one hand he says """"We've been late, we've all done it"""" & then on the other, he says SHE can't tell time?,,,Well if HE admitted being late himself, that means HE can't either....The woman clearly has issues,,,,So he thinks the best course of action is to post her rant online, to mock her and THEN incite others to do the same? Really Charles Topher? You have never gotten to a level of rage where you snapped to a point like she did using foul language & ugly words as she did???? Not ONE time in your entire LIFE???....NO.... inciting people to outrage over someone who clearly has anger issues & needs help...THAT is what's wrong..Because you are spreading the hateful words of another person No Charles Topher...What's wrong with America is there are people here who think they are better than others,,,THAT part you got right.....The part you got wrong is that you did NOT include yourself as being part of the problem..It's called hypocrisy....Either way....Like her? You oughta be ashamed of yourself....Also like her? You aren't....Now if someone wants to call ME a hypocrite for posting this, go ahead....Because I know the meaning of the word....HE doesn't apparently...I already KNOW I am....He doesn't know that HE is,,,,THATS the problem with America...
